Name: French Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: A simple riff on the French Martini swapping the usual vodka for the more French cognac. Fruity and easy drinking.
History: Created in June 2011 by yours truly at The Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of French Cocktail contains 211 calories
